summary: Contributed to large-scale Guidewire migrations/upgrades, focusing on UI automation and test framework improvements.
highlights: Authored the majority of UI automation for a Guidewire migration; served as the sole UI automation engineer.
Implemented C# reflection-based enhancements to enable dynamic, data-driven test execution.
Built a reflection-based multi-dataset loader to improve test data scalability and maintainability.
Enhanced element interaction utilities for table and selector handling, improving test stability.
Created a Cypress + GT proof-of-concept to evaluate selector strategies and supported CI/CD readiness.

summary: Developed and launched a high-performing, responsive website using React and TailwindCSS.
highlights: Rebuilt the website with React and Tailwind; reduced load time by over 67%.
Implemented responsive design and achieved 99/92/91 scores on PageSpeed Insights.
Owned the project end-to-end from design to deployment and ongoing maintenance.

summary: Led intern development efforts to deliver a backend-driven web app, architecting core APIs and server components.
highlights: Led a team of interns to deliver a lottery webapp within three weeks.
Architected and implemented ~90% of the backend APIs, reducing development time by ~30%.
Delivered a stable, functioning app on schedule with minimal defects.
